overview: Taken to the Edge is an all edging movie with 9 of the best tease artists to have graced the screen. From the slowest of movies and softest touches, this is the first of its kind, the ultimate tease video. You'll see an edging movie done masterfully and with the industry's top performers. Each scene focuses on the slowest excitements in order to get each guy off.
title: Taken to the Edge
